snippet.title: Clark Catches a Bullet - Superman (1978) Movie Clip HD
snippet.description:
Superman/Clark Kent (Christopher Reeve) saves Lois Lane (Margot Kidder) by catching a bullet - moment/scene from Superman (1978)
When a mugger threatens Lois and Clark in an alley, he fires a gun ‚Äî but Clark discreetly catches the bullet with his bare hand, without revealing his true identity as Superman.
